scripts.clean: ([ -d dist ] && [ `ls dist | wc -l` -gt '0' ] && rm -r dist/*) || ([ -f dist ] && rm dist) || echo "already cleaned"
scripts.init: npm install --save-dev --unsafe-perm babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react @babel/cli @babel/polyfill @babel/plugin-proposal-decorators @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties react-hot-loader webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server mocker-api html-webpack-plugin css-loader mini-css-extract-plugin less less-loader url-loader file-loader html-loader sass-loader node-sass vue-loader vue-template-compiler postcss-loader autoprefixer
